author: Gina
content:
that you have a city view all to yourself is what i thought makes this shot until i sat with it a little while and now i think it would benefit from 'something' but as there is no-one else around THIS is the pic.  I love the reflected image, the new sunlight and the viewpoint ... nice work >>> Gina
http://ginaseye.blogspot.com/ 
http://fyneartstreasures.blogspot.com/
